subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Andrey Amador won the 14th stage of the Giro d’Italia and Ryder Hesjedal took back the overall lead from Joaquin Rodríguez as the race took to the Alps.
snippet: Andrey Amador won the 14th stage of the Giro d’Italia and Ryder Hesjedal took back the overall lead from Joaquin Rodríguez as the race took to the Alps.
